root.description: Set in 2018, and an alien invasion force have attacked without warning, putting up impenetrable energy shields across the planet. You play as Krazy Ivan, the world's best and/or craziest Mech pilot, and you've gotten your hands on the World's best Mech, a 40ft machine armed with a multitude of upgradeable weapon systems and customizable armor.In between missions you're presented with live acted full motion video cutscenes.PC System RequirementsMinimumRecommendedOperating System: Windows 95Processor: Pentium 60 MHzMemory: 8 MB RAMCDROM: 2xGraphics Card: 1 MB SVGA Video CardSound Card: Sound Blaster or 100% compatiblePeripherals: Keyboard and mouseOperating System: Windows 95Processor: Pentium 90 MHzRAM Memory: 16 MB RAMCDROM: 2xGraphics Card: 2 MB SVGA Video CardSound Card: Sound Blaster or 100% compatiblePeripherals: Keyboard and mouse, Null Modem cable for Head to Head combat
